00065     virtual uint32_t get_total_entries() {
00066       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00067       uint32_t total = 0;
00068       for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00069         total += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_total_entries();
00070       return total;
00071     }

00148     bool
00149     get_split_info(SplitPredicate &predicate, CommitLogPtr &split_log_ptr,
00150                    int64_t *latest_revisionp) {
00151       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00152       *latest_revisionp = m_latest_revision;
00153       if (m_split_log_ptr) {
00154         predicate.load(m_split_row, m_split_off_high);
00155         split_log_ptr = m_split_log_ptr;
00156         return true;
00157       }
00158       predicate.clear();
00159       return false;
00160     }
